alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 8:57PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bonner and northwestern Kootenai Counties through 845 PM PDT... At 756 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rathdrum, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spirit Lake. This includes U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 446 and 447. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
